divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS ON OUR BACK DECK AT APPROX 10 PM AND OFF TOO MY LEFT I OBSERVED A COLORFULL OBJECT SLOWLY COME INTO VEIW OVER SOME TREES. IT WAS TRIANGULAR IN SHPE WITH A WHIE LIGHT IN THE FRONT AND ONE ON EACH REAR CORNER FOR A TOTAL OF THREE. VARIOUS COLORS TOOK UP THE CENTER OF THE CRAFT. THE CRAFT WAS GOING VERY SLOW WITH NO SOUND.MY WIFE WITNESSED THE OBJECT AS WELL AS IT SLOWLY FLOATED OVER US.SHE RUN FOR THE CAMERA BUT BY THE TIME SHE RETURNED THE CRAFTPICKED UP SPEED AND WENT INTO A BANK OF CLOUDS.ALL WE WERE SURE OF IS THIS OBJECT WAS QUITE LOW HOWEVER I WOULD ONLY BE GUESSING AT IT'S DIMENSIONS AS IT WAS AGAINST A DARK CLOUDY SKY.WE ARN'T SURE WHAT WE SAW BUT WE KNOW WHAT IT WASN'T. ANY FEEDBACK WOULD BE GREATLY APPRECIATED.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Limestone
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Colorfull object in the shape of a triangle.
